    pipeline={
        "description": "parse multiple patterns",
        "processors": [
            {
                "grok": {
                    "field": "message",
                    "patterns": [
                        "%{FAVORITE_DOG:pet}",
                        "%{FAVORITE_CAT:pet}"
                    ],
                    "pattern_definitions": {
                        "FAVORITE_DOG": "beagle",
                        "FAVORITE_CAT": "burmese"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    docs=[

        }

print(resp)
